title: Chocolate truffles
description: These moreish chocolate truffles are strictly for sweet-toothed chocoholics - keep them under lock and key as they're addictive and almost too easy to make.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz assorted chocolate bars, including dark chocolate, milk chocolate and raisin and nut chocolate, broken into pieces
100g/4oz chopped mixed nuts, such as pistachios, roasted hazelnuts and almonds
